extendedInfo.description: This is an application which helps in you in blocking calls and messages from any unreliable caller or message sender. This application provides you the ability to block any call, message or both from any particular phoneâs contact or number. It also avails you in blocking service messages especially like TD, TR, LM, IZ, etc.The most innovative aspect of the application is that the unwanted blocked phone callers are not even able to recognize that his or her calls have been black listed in your mobile and what he or she seems is just a busy ringtone during the call. So it doesn't provide the sense of black listing to the caller.

reviews.title: Liars
reviews.comment: This app is BS! From the false advertising to the FAKE good reviews. The \"blocked caller\" gets sent to voice mail. Blocking a call would be NOT GETTING THROUGH AT ALL!
reviews.author: Nikki Mongan

reviews.title: samsung glxy S2
reviews.comment: The perfect one i was looking for as no one know that u have blocked them. Only problem is  i cannot acess my phone book to select a number. When the contact tab is selected only the email contacts pops up insted of the phone book contacts. I have to manually enter the number  to be blocked  in the number tab. Please rectify it. otherwise its a GREAT application!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jk
reviews.comment: Its nice app. I use many but it work faster and quickly prevent the call so caller listen only busy tone. But for improvement it had the features of add no. from logs and contect book
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ashok
reviews.comment: Application is working fine when i blocked call and sms it taking no. from the contact list
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NI
reviews.comment: Doesnt show contacts. No history of blocked calls, sms
reviews.author: A Google User
